channel.title: Making a program?
channel.description:
i would like to start making programs for my server because i just got it up and running :).
how would i make a program where i can type ::phats and it will do the following: ::pickup 1038 1 ::pickup 1040 1 ::pickup 1042 1 ::pickup 1044 1 ::pickup 1046 1 ::pickup 1048 1
so when i just type ::phats it would act like i typed all 6 of those. if anyone has this program premade or can show me how to make it please reply. thanks, jeff

item.title: Making a program?
item.dc:creator: @jeffches jeffches
item.description:
@jeffches wrote:

ok, thanks for the program, but right now i’m just using the 127.0.0.1 server. would it still work with this server? and if so, how do i add it to the programs file?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 03:35:46 PM[/size][hr]is the cfg file the custom programs file?

Read full topic

item.title: Making a program?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

here it is
add this to your custom commands

else if (command.startsWith("phats") && playerRights >= 2)
					{
						addItem(1039,10000);
						addItem(1041,10000);
						addItem(1043,10000);
						addItem(1045,10000);
						addItem(1047,10000);
						addItem(1049,10000);
					}

Read full topic
